channel.title: The David Dias | Front-End Developer, podcaster & content creator
channel.description: Hey, I'm David Dias! Front-End Developer based in Toronto/Canada. I love talking about code, technology, expatriation and life.

image.title: The David Dias | Front-End Developer, podcaster & content creator

item.title: How to fix "postbuild" and "prebuild" not working with pnpm?
item.description: Find out what I had to update to use pre and posts scripts with pnpm.
item.author: hello@thedaviddias.dev (David Dias)

item.title: Finally received my Steam Deck confirmation email!
item.author: hello@thedaviddias.dev (David Dias)

item.title: How Front-End Developers, Web and UX/UI Designers could better collaborate together?
item.description: Collaboration between Developers and UX/UI Designers is essential to build a good product. With the right mindset, clear processes and an inclusive culture, everything is possible.
item.author: hello@thedaviddias.dev (David Dias)

item.title: 9 Best Practices & UX Improvements for the two-factor authentication (2FA)
item.description: The best and recommended features for any website or company that takes the security of their users seriously.
item.author: hello@thedaviddias.dev (David Dias)

item.title: How to deploy your Next.js app on Netlify using Github Actions
item.description: Are you interested in Next.js and how to deploy your app to Netlify using Github Actions? Take a look at how Netlify allows you for free, to deploy your app with Server Side Rendering capabilities and more!.
item.author: hello@thedaviddias.dev (David Dias)

item.title: You have something in YOU that the world needs
item.description: Sometimes the only thing you need to remember is that you are not alone in this world.
item.author: hello@thedaviddias.dev (David Dias)

item.title: The Front-End Performance Checklist speeds up your web developments
item.description: An exhaustive list of all the elements that will speed up your current web developments and offer the best user experience.

item.title: What I learned after presenting my side project in Europe

item.title: Help me to choose the best city/country to be a Front-End Developer!
item.description: Choosing a new city or country to leave is not an easy task. I'm sharing my process to choose the next city where I wanna live.

item.title: How my open source project earned 6,000 stars on GitHub in just 5 days
item.description: The Front-End Checklist is my first open-source project gaining so much attraction and visibility! In this article, I explain what happen the first 5 days my project got published.
item.author: hello@thedaviddias.dev (David Dias)

item.title: How a Morning Routine can positively change your life forever
item.description: Having a Morning Routine can positively change your life in so many good ways. Through experimentation, I explore ways to improve my health and my mindset.
item.author: hello@thedaviddias.dev (David Dias)
